item.description:
"Romantic Comedy" play THIS SAT. 02/16 in Windsor, followed by a private house party in West Hartford.
My lovely and talented daughter, Ellen, (17) will be performing in her final High School play this SATURDAY @ Windsor High School. You are welcome to join me and some of my friends gathering in the W.H.S. theater lobby @ 7:00PM so we can sit together and I'll hand out directions to the "adults only"
party afterwards. The performance starts @ 7:30 (ending @ 9:30- 10-ish). Tickets are $8 for adults, at the door. Following this performance, we'll head back to "Bob & Rob's place" in West Hartford for a VERY CASUAL BYO party, typically featuring dancing, joking, eating, drinking, games, and making new friends!
Please RSVP if you are planning to join us for the Play & Party, indicating if you'll be meeting us @ W.H.S. or carpooling from our place in W.H., leaving @ 6:45. Thx.
MapQuest directions to: Windsor High School, 50 Sage Park Road, Windsor, CT 06095 (NOTE: DO NOT confuse with the Jr. H.
S. across the street)
I hope you can join us!
- Rob
Rob Pudney
rep06110@yahoo.com
***
"Romantic Comedy is a play by Bernard Slade, author of Same Time, Next Year.
The plot focuses on Phoebe Craddock and Jason Carmichael, playwrights who meet and decide to collaborate just as he is getting married. Their relationship produces first a failure and then a string of successes, and their repart√©e remains sharp and witty as their unrequited interest in each other gathers energy over a nine-year period, until some resolution finally is in sight."
item.how_to_find_us: Rob Pudney is of our meetup members (see his profile below) and is leading this event.
item.name: "Romantic Comedy", A Play, Windsor, party in W. Hartford afterward
